name: you have been destroyed (100% OFF!)
description:
published: Jan 1 2019

you have been destroyed is a game where you have to dash all the red objects, really simple. There are three modes to choose: easy, medium, and hard.

Your score is on the top-left of the screen. Play with your friends and beat their highscores!

"This game is hard and annoying"

Consider before playing if your blood pressure is high.

"The music is a little bit creepy"

If you think so, turn off the music.

But if you don't think so, turn on for best experiences.
